title: Christmas, Kevin Hart, Bad Acting Theater, Pimpin' NFL, DMX, Golden Globes, Tyler Perry, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Christmas, Kevin Hart, Bad Acting Theater, Pimpin' NFL, DMX, Golden Globes, Tyler Perry, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Happy Friday. Puff puff pass. Kevin Hart steps down from hosting this year's Academy Awards. The Chapmans return with Bad Acting Theater. Pimpin' as always gives us his picks with NFL week 14. DMX has been mentioned by Cohen's legal team in regards to a lighter sentence. The Golden Globes are near and we have the nominees. Tyler Perry shows us what holiday cheer is all about. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog mentions Ephesians 3:20 and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
